<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Given a floating point type and a fixed-point semantic, return a floating</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Convert an integer value representing a fixed-point number to an integer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// with the given bit width and signedness.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointbuilder/#a1d99db3b205c5c656e11e25cc98b9917"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointbuilder/#a1d99db3b205c5c656e11e25cc98b9917">CreateFixedToInteger</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Src, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics">FixedPointSemantics</a> &amp;SrcSema,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Convert an integer value with the given signedness to an integer value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// representing the given fixed-point semantic.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p Src         - The source value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p SrcIsSigned - The signedness of the source value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p DstSema     - The resulting fixed-point semantic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointbuilder/#ac2cb8d79fa94ae788233f1af991fd9c4"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointbuilder/#ac2cb8d79fa94ae788233f1af991fd9c4">CreateIntegerToFixed</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Src, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SrcIsSigned,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics">FixedPointSemantics</a> &amp;DstSema) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Convert(Src,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#aebc9b19a86db06690ffcc4904907e8be">FixedPointSemantics::GetIntegerSemantics</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       Src-&gt;getType()-&gt;getScalarSizeInBits(), SrcIsSigned),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   DstSema, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointbuilder/#a00109923471ab72b20f0959d8eb230b9"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointbuilder/#a00109923471ab72b20f0959d8eb230b9">CreateFixedToFloating</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Src, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics">FixedPointSemantics</a> &amp;SrcSema,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;DstTy) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Result;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;OpTy = getAccommodatingFloatType(DstTy, SrcSema);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Convert the raw fixed-point value directly to floating point. If the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value is too large to fit, it will be rounded, not truncated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Result = SrcSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a05ad0838e692b5cdc021f49da8343187">isSigned</a>() ? B.CreateSIToFP(Src, OpTy)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                : B.CreateUIToFP(Src, OpTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rescale the integral-in-floating point by the scaling factor. This is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// lossless, except for overflow to infinity which is unlikely.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Result = B.CreateFMul(Result,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ConstantFP::get(OpTy, std::pow(2, -(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)SrcSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a5eb21a8a338a43390965253fb71d152d">getScale</a>())));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OpTy != DstTy)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Result = B.CreateFPTrunc(Result, DstTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Result;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointbuilder/#a0a1c9934f39747a96a2b6b42d0bec03e"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointbuilder/#a0a1c9934f39747a96a2b6b42d0bec03e">CreateFloatingToFixed</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Src, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics">FixedPointSemantics</a> &amp;DstSema) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UseSigned = DstSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a05ad0838e692b5cdc021f49da8343187">isSigned</a>() || DstSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a516540ad4950d71de2266507041b9c6e">hasUnsignedPadding</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Result = Src;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;OpTy = getAccommodatingFloatType(Src-&gt;getType(), DstSema);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OpTy != Src-&gt;getType())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Result = B.CreateFPExt(Result, OpTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rescale the floating point value so that its significant bits (for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// purposes of the conversion) are in the integral range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Result = B.CreateFMul(Result,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ConstantFP::get(OpTy, std::pow(2, DstSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a5eb21a8a338a43390965253fb71d152d">getScale</a>())));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;ResultTy = B.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#acaf8e4c3e40e01e848c1fad5f05b81cd">getIntNTy</a>(DstSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a2f3dab29dd773a1faa002a701261db99">getWidth</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DstSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a56da39babaf07b5638145d232de64949">isSaturated</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#a80add6b3b1cdaec560907995127adc16">Intrinsic::ID</a> IID =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">          UseSigned ? Intrinsic::fptosi&#95;sat : Intrinsic::fptoui&#95;sat;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Result = B.CreateIntrinsic(IID, &#123;ResultTy, OpTy&#125;, &#123;Result&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Result = UseSigned ? B.CreateFPToSI(Result, ResultTy)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         : B.CreateFPToUI(Result, ResultTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When saturating unsigned-with-padding using signed operations, we may</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// get negative values. Emit an extra clamp to zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DstSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a56da39babaf07b5638145d232de64949">isSaturated</a>() &amp;&amp; DstSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a516540ad4950d71de2266507041b9c6e">hasUnsignedPadding</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42;Zero = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant/#aa6574d526b3e38a28f688a7bb4325c2c">Constant::getNullValue</a>(Result-&gt;getType());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Result =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">          B.CreateSelect(B.CreateICmpSLT(Result, Zero), Zero, Result, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;satmin&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Result;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Add two fixed-point values and return the result in their common semantic.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p LHS     - The left hand side</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p LHSSema - The semantic of the left hand side</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p RHS     - The right hand side</span></CodeLine>
